video.title: Ikki tôsen: Great Guardians
video.synopsis: As Hakufu prepares to fight for prize money, she comes across familiar faces trying to do the same -- and meets the sister she didn't know she had.

episodes.synopsis: Hakufu and her crew work to raise money for a tournament where they will face fierce opponents. When her little sister shows up, things get crazy!
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: When a gang of thugs kidnaps her sweet little sister, Hakufu goes on a rampage. The odds are not on her side, but luckily, her friends are!
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Ryomou is shocked to stumble upon a girl everyone thought was dead, but all Hakufu can think of is taking the new girl to a karoake bar!
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: Mysterious necklaces that unleash their wearers' deepest desires create havoc at a martial arts shrine. Pretty ones, beware what lurks within!
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: A day at the beach turns into a treasure hunt, but when giant man-eating sharks appear, the bikini-clad warrior babes show off their moves.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: A quest to recover lost memories lures Hakufu's crew into an ambush at an abandoned school. Amidst a flurry of flying fists, they revisit the past.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Possessed by a mysterious girl in a cape, Ryofu wreaks havoc on her new friends. Her scandalous behavior with Gentoku may push Kanu over the edge.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: Suspicious of her master's odd behavior, Kanu sends a messenger to ask Hakufu for help; Ryomou's peaceful dip in a hot spring is disrupted by Ryofu.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Saji and the magician who shares his name use Ryofu as the centerpiece of a heinous plot to awaken the dragon lurking within Ryomou.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: When Hakufu is possessed by the magician, cousin Koukin and Chuubo must make a dangerous stand to prevent her from being lost forever.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: Chuubo reveals her shocking true identity,then joins forces with Koukin and Hakufu on a perilous mission to rescue Ryomou!
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: Koukin and Hakufu risk their lives in the battle to save Chuubo; brawling with Ryofu, Ryomou learns a lesson of vital importance.
episodes.title: Episode 12
